input_text.Prompt:
Using the product keywords and product name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product name:
Chrome Plated Angel Wind Chime

Product keywords:
Chrome Plated
Genuine Austrian crystal
Superb metal craftsmanship
Perfect for gifting
Swarovski Crystal
input_text.Response A: Introducing the Chrome Plated Angel Wind Chime, a stunning piece of metal craftsmanship that is sure to catch the eye of anyone who sees it. Made with superb metalwork, this wind chime is not only beautiful but also durable. The chrome plating gives it a sleek and modern look, while the Swarovski Crystal adds a touch of elegance. This wind chime is the perfect gift for any occasion, and it is sure to be a hit with whoever receives it.
input_text.Response B:
Attention:
The Chrome Plated Angel Wind Chime is a stunning piece of art that would make the perfect gift for any occasion. Its chrome plating and genuine Austrian crystal make it stand out in any home or garden. The superb metal craftsmanship adds to its beauty and durability. If you want to give a gift that will be cherished for years to come, this is the perfect choice.

Interest:
The Chrome Plated Angel Wind Chime is not just a beautiful piece of art, it also makes a great investment. The value of genuine Swarovski crystal is sure to increase over time, making it a valuable asset to any collector. The craftsmanship of this piece is so impressive that it has even been featured in museums and high-end art galleries.

Desire:
This wind chime would look great in any home or garden, adding a touch of elegance and sophistication to any space. The delicate angel design and sparkling crystals make it a wonderful addition to any decor. The soothing sound of the chimes will add a peaceful ambiance to any environment.

Action:
Order your Chrome Plated Angel Wind Chime today and enjoy the beauty and serenity it brings to your home or garden. This is the perfect gift for anyone who appreciates fine art and craftsmanship. You can even order multiple pieces to create a custom display that will impress all of your guests. Limited quantities available, so order today!

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
